Description:
Forecasting regional sales targets, evaluating and analyzing their sales & marketing performance based on their sales data and trends.
Participate in various sales and marketing events to promote the products and services of the company.

Relay responsibilities to team members and monitor their timely completion.Skills
Skills:
Excellent negotiation and presentation skills.

Monitor sales operations in different company branches across the globe.
